title: Gov. Ron DeSantis' war on 'woke' appears to be losing steam in Florida
description: A federal court recently blocked most of a key DeSantis measure, the Stop WOKE Act. Courts have ruled against a number of the governor's conservative initiatives.

title: A glimpse of the chaos in Haiti, a country reeling with effectively no leader
description: NPR reports from inside Haiti, as gangs unleash another day of violence in the country's capital. It comes as political groups try to form a transitional council.

title: In Gaza, Palestinian journalists are documenting a war they're also trying to survive
description: Israel — with rare exceptions — has prevented foreign journalists from entering Gaza. As such, Palestinian reporters remain the world's eyes and ears on the ground, and they do so at great peril.

title: 'The American Society of Magical Negroes': You don't wanna join this club
description: The film is convinced Black people on screen and in real life are, by and large, contending with the same stereotypes and barriers that we were 20 years ago.

title: Just because your favorite singer is dead doesn't mean you can't see them 'live'
description: The upcoming immersive "Elvis Evolution" experience in London employs everything from cutting edge AI to a 200-year-old magic trick.

title: They were injured at the Super Bowl parade. A month later, they feel forgotten
description: A Kansas family remembers Valentine's Day as the start of panic attacks, life-altering trauma and waking to nightmares of gunfire. They wonder how they'll recover from the Kansas City parade shooting.

title: Police in Ohio confirm 2 dead from storm system that damaged homes and businesses
description: A fierce storm system unleashed suspected twisters and damaged homes and businesses in parts of Ohio and Kentucky on Thursday. Indiana State Police said there are "many significant injuries" there.

title: Family of slain Ukrainian journalist sues Fox News, alleging a cover up
description: Oleksandra Kuvshynova's parents say Fox News put their daughter in harm's way unnecessarily, then promoted a false account of her death. They also point blame at a reporter who was with her that day.
